headlines.description: — Jeffrey Schlupp came off the bench to earn Crystal Palace a 2-2 draw against Leicester after his former club threw away a two-goal lead at Selhurst Park on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Schlupp recovers 2-2 draw for Palace against Leicester

headlines.description: — Tottenham ended a three-match losing run in the Premier League by beating Aston Villa 2-1 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tottenham beats Villa 2-1 to end 3-match league losing run

headlines.description: Yoanne Wissa struck a dramatic 94th-minute winner to give Brentford a 2-1 victory over West Ham United at the London Stadium on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wissa grabs last-gasp winner as Brentford beat West Ham

headlines.description: Manchester City twice pegged back Liverpool to earn a thrilling 2-2 draw at Liverpool on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: De Bruyne rescues late draw for City at Liverpool
